title: Picking a top lane
body:
So I was looking for a top lane and I came to the conclusions. Shen {{champion:98}} and Yorick {{champion:83}} .

Currently, I main Shyvana Jungle and build Tanky DPS with her if you want to know about my play style currently. {{champion:102}} I'd rather prefer tanky than anything else but being very bursty is probably my second preference.

I was wondering about whether I should use Shen or Yorick or if I should go Shyvana top.

Thanks,
~Cloudy

replies.body: If you want to consistently win then don't pick Yorick.

The reason Yorick isn't particularly consistent is mostly due to his ult. It really relies on having an AA based champ on your team doing fairly well, since the ghost only uses AA's. Otherwise your ult doesn't really do anything spectacular. He also tends to fall off come 5-6 items.
Thanks, why do you suggest this? (what build should I do with her?)
shyvana top with teleport and smite is great. start off on raptors or wolfs to get an early lead then use that to try and take control of the lane. :D
